root.name: Flight Unlimited
root.description: OverviewThis is the first entry in the series for Flight Unlimited on PC (MS-DOS).Â Gameplay Features: - Pioneered physics system (which is complex for how you control the plane in comparison to Flight Simulator) - Landscapes (first to use photo realistic and 3D mesh for the world) - Challenges featuring acrobatics such as flying through hoops and racing against a clock Available Flyable Aircraft: - Bellanca Decathalon - Extra 300 - Pitts Special S-2B - GROB Sailplane G-103A Twin II Acro - Sukhoi Su-31
